attributes.action: Ban football hooligans from travelling abroad, attending any & all football game
attributes.additional_details: For too long now hooliganism has had a foothold in our society, Not just football but other sports as well it has now come to a head where we seen scenes of football fans causing riots causing mess causing racism and targeting members of the sporting community it’s has to stop the government needs to step in and say enough is enough remove their passports and also banned them from attending any sporting event for life
attributes.background: We want the government to remove all passports from those who calls hooliganism, racism, acts of violence against football players, stewards, and other members of the public We need to make all sporting events save for those wishing to enjoy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591894
